skills.description: Shoots 3 projectiles, with each projectile having a 30% chance to slow the Attack Speed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Silver-plated Bullet
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times with holy bullets and removes 1 harmful effect. Disturbs HP recovery for 2 turns with a 50% chance for each attack.

skills.name: Chaser (Passive)
skills.description: Decreases the enemy's Attack Bar by 10% with each attack and weakens the enemy's defense for 1 turn with a 50% chance. [Automatic Effect]
